title: Why does the Asset Store say I am offline?

sections.title: Symptoms
content: • Every time I try to download an asset it says "You are currently offline"

sections.title: Cause
content: You want to download Assets that you have purchased from the Asset Store. You try to launch your Unity Asset Store account, but you get a window saying that your are offline even though your Internet connection has not dropped.

sections.title: Resolution
content: You probably have a firewall or proxy in place. These can block the connection to our servers. To ensure you are not running the Asset Store from behind a proxy server:

• Type "configure proxy server" into the Start menu bar.

  • Click on LAN settings

  • Uncheck "Use a proxy server for your LAN"
